title: Time in a Bottle
description: An Erotic Science Fiction NovellaNorman 'Norm' Paine isn't quite what you might expect a hero to be, but regardless of his clueless klutziness, his bumbling bookworm side and his lack of cosmopolitan polish, he's exactly what you...and planet Earth need. He finds himself in a bit of an embarrassing predicament in the beginning of our story, but with the help of a mysterious woman with an earth-shattering secret, Norm is soon...'deep' inside a centuries-old global conspiracy that requires his unique personality, hilarious tendency to screw things up and his command of an ancient artifact to save the world. As his mystery woman drags him further out of his comfort zone and into hers, passion explodes, and fantasies unfold before you. Will Norm survive the dark and dangerous realm of his new lust interest, or will he meet an untimely and twisted demise? See for yourself, and explore his transformation into Earth's most unlikely and quirky hero through the unpredictable, adventurous and seductive guidance & love of a good...woman?
author: Max Cummings
